description: This is a source code file for an accessible, responsive carousel React component implemented in TypeScript. It includes props validation, accessibility features, autoplay with timers, gesture support, error handling for images, and interaction logging for audit purposes.

classes.name: Carousel
classes.description: A React functional component implementing an accessible, responsive carousel with autoplay, touch and keyboard navigation, indicators, and audit logging.

methods.name: usePrefersReducedMotion
methods.description: Custom hook to detect if user prefers reduced motion setting for accessibility.

methods.name: useSwipe
methods.description: Custom hook implementing swipe gesture detection for touch devices, supporting left and right swipe actions.
